BuildableTexture

public BuildableTexture(int pWidth,
                        int pHeight)
Uses TextureFormat#RGBA_8888.

Parameters:
pWidth - must be a power of 2 (i.e. 32, 64, 128, 256, 512, 1024).
pHeight - must be a power of 2 (i.e. 32, 64, 128, 256, 512, 1024).

BuildableTexture

public BuildableTexture(int pWidth,
                        int pHeight,
                        Texture.TextureFormat pTextureFormat)
Parameters:
pWidth - must be a power of 2 (i.e. 32, 64, 128, 256, 512, 1024).
pHeight - must be a power of 2 (i.e. 32, 64, 128, 256, 512, 1024).
pTextureFormat - use TextureFormat#RGBA_8888 for Textures with transparency and TextureFormat#RGB_565 for Textures without transparency.

BuildableTexture

public BuildableTexture(int pWidth,
                        int pHeight,
                        Texture.ITextureStateListener pTextureStateListener)
Uses TextureFormat#RGBA_8888.

Parameters:
pWidth - must be a power of 2 (i.e. 32, 64, 128, 256, 512, 1024).
pHeight - must be a power of 2 (i.e. 32, 64, 128, 256, 512, 1024).
pTextureStateListener - to be informed when this BuildableTexture is loaded, unloaded or a ITextureSource failed to load.

pHeight - must be a power of 2 (i.e. 32, 64, 128, 256, 512, 1024).
pTextureFormat - use TextureFormat#RGBA_8888 for Textures with transparency and TextureFormat#RGB_565 for Textures without transparency.
pTextureStateListener - to be informed when this BuildableTexture is loaded, unloaded or a ITextureSource failed to load.

Method Detail

addTextureSource

@Deprecated
public Texture.TextureSourceWithLocation addTextureSource(ITextureSource pTextureSource,
                                                                     int pTexturePositionX,
                                                                     int pTexturePositionY)
Deprecated. Use BuildableTexture#addTextureSource(ITextureSource) instead.

Most likely this is not the method you'd want to be using, as the ITextureSource won't get packed through this.

Overrides:
addTextureSource in class Texture

Parameters:

pTextureRegion -

removeTextureSource

public void removeTextureSource(ITextureSource pTextureSource)
Removes a ITextureSource before build(ITextureBuilder) is called.

Parameters:
pTextureSource - to be removed.

build

public void build(ITextureBuilder pTextureSourcePackingAlgorithm)
           throws ITextureBuilder.TextureSourcePackingException
May draw over already added ITextureSources.

Parameters:
pTextureSourcePackingAlgorithm - the ITextureBuilder to use for packing the ITextureSource in this BuildableTexture.
Throws:
ITextureBuilder.TextureSourcePackingException - i.e. when the ITextureSources didn't fit into this BuildableTexture.
